m_szDocSumamry: Climate Skeptics' Leading Scientist Funded by Dirty Energy February 27th, 2010 by Zachary Shahan Â  If you are gardening, you have to pay attention to the plants you want to grow, but you also have to pay some attention to the weeds. We seem to be at the beginning of a true clean energy revolution, but even as we admire the nutritious, delicious-looking clean energy crops sprouting up, we have to spend a little time keeping an eye on the weeds.
